alert.note: Alert for Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 7:25AM EST until March 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulation 3 to 6 inches. Northwest winds will gust around 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Baltimore and Northwest Harford Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may be reduced to below one- quarter mile at times. Brief near blizzard conditions are possible between 8 and noon. Snowfall rates around one to two inches per hour are expected this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
